annotations.description: Today's game was very poor. There weren't many thrilling moments. The home side dominated today's game. The home side attempted to hold onto the ball for as long as possible, while the away side focused on defending and let the opposition keep possession.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's the end of the match.
The resulting free kick from James McClean (West Brom) ends up in the gloves of the keeper.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) sends Glyn Oliver Myhill the wrong way and fires the penalty into the middle of the goal!

annotations.label: r-card
annotations.description: Gareth McAuley (West Brom) can have an early bath after receiving a red card from the referee!
Michael Dean blows his whistle after Bastian Schweinsteiger (Manchester United) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle. A free kick is awarded to West Brom.

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: Gareth McAuley (West Brom) trips an opposition player and Michael Dean signals a foul. PENALTY AWARDED to Manchester United!

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 4 min. of added time.

annotations.label: attendance
annotations.description: The attendance for today's match is 75410.
Anthony Martial plays a pass to Mata (Manchester United), but he fails to get a decent shot away from inside the box and the ball goes high over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: A horde of players are waiting inside the penalty area for a cross from the corner, but Mata (Manchester United) takes it short.
Mata (Manchester United) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. Manchester United have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Callum McManaman (West Brom) in, Chris Brunt out.
Mata (Manchester United) takes a short free kick.
Claudio Yacob (West Brom) holds his opponent to prevent him from getting the ball and the referee blows for a foul after seeing the whole situation. Manchester United are awarded the free kick.

James McClean (West Brom) latches on to a precise lofted cross inside the box, controls the ball and unleashes a fine strike towards the middle of the goal. His dangerous effort is blocked by David de Gea, who makes a glorious save!

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The referee signals a substitution. Ander Herrera (Manchester United) is brought on as a substitute for Wayne Rooney.
Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Mata (Manchester United) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.
Daley Blind (Manchester United) delivers a long ball, but it lacks enough power to reach his teammates and is intercepted by one of the defenders. Manchester United have a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Wayne Rooney (Manchester United) quickly takes the corner kick with a short pass.
The ball is cleared after Anthony Martial (Manchester United) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. The ball goes out of play. Manchester United are awarded a corner kick.
One of the defenders reacts at the last minute to brilliantly block a pass from Stephane Sessegnon (West Brom).
Michael Carrick (Manchester United) gets to the rebound just outside the box, but his attempt is blocked by one of the defending players.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The manager makes a subsitution with Cameron Borthwick Jackson (Manchester United) coming on for Marcos Rojo.
Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away. The referee and the linesman both signal a throw in for Manchester United.
Saido Berahino (West Brom) misses a good chance to score. A perfect cross into the box finds Saido Berahino (West Brom) who rises for a header, but he sends the ball well over the bar.
Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) dances his way past two defending players and gets to the edge of the box from where he unleashes a shot that goes well wide of the right post.
Jonny Evans (West Brom) plants a header from the edge of the box after a nice cross from the free kick. It lacks accuracy and the ball misses the left post by a few inches.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Tony Pulis has decided to make a change. Rickie Lambert (West Brom) replaces Jose Rondon.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: James Morrison comes off the pitch to be replaced by Saido Berahino (West Brom).
Michael Dean interrupts the game for a tactical foul by Marcos Rojo (Manchester United). It's a free kick to West Brom, but it's in no position for a direct shot on goal.
Another attempt to send the ball beyond the defence by James Morrison (West Brom) is thwarted and cleared to safety.
The Manchester United players are exchanging short passes in an attempt to create a shooting opportunity.
Wayne Rooney (Manchester United) receives a pass and fires a shot in from long range, but it's blocked.
Bastian Schweinsteiger (Manchester United) quickly takes the free kick with a short pass.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Chris Brunt (West Brom) commits a nasty foul by bringing down his opponent.
A fine lofted pass into the box, sent by James McClean (West Brom), is intercepted by the opposition's defence.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: It is time for a substitution. Phil Jones (Manchester United) is on for Ashley Young.
Craig Dawson (West Brom) takes a direct free kick.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Marcos Rojo (Manchester United) commits a foul and is shown a yellow card without any hesitation from the referee.
David de Gea (Manchester United) is going to send the ball in from the free kick.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Jose Rondon (West Brom) has tested the patience of referee Michael Dean and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.
Michael Carrick (Manchester United) attempts to slip the ball through the defence, but is unable to find any of his teammates.
The Manchester United players keep the ball and are exchanging a combination of passes. They are waiting for gaps in the defence to open up.
The ball is cleared after Stephane Sessegnon (West Brom) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. The ball goes out of play and Manchester United will have a goal kick.
Jonny Evans (West Brom) takes the free kick and immediately restarts play with a short pass.
A player from Manchester United commits an attacking foul. The referee blows his whistle. It's a free kick to West Brom, but they probably won't attempt a direct shot on goal from here.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) picks up the ball from a rebound and from the edge of the box he unleashes a shot inside the right post. It's 1:0.
Anthony Martial (Manchester United) sends a cross into the box. However, the opponent's defence eliminates the danger by clearing the ball out.
Jose Rondon (West Brom) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away. The ball has crossed the sideline. West Brom are taking a throw in.
Michael Dean interrupts the game for a tactical foul by Chris Smalling (Manchester United).
Wayne Rooney (Manchester United) tries to find Anthony Martial with a clever through ball from the corner of the box, but the defence is alert to the danger and makes a clearance.
Juan Manuel Mata (Manchester United) sends a promising through ball, but the defence is alert and cuts out the pass.
Gareth McAuley (West Brom) puts a cross into the box from the free kick but it's cleared.
Foul! Marcos Rojo (Manchester United) is penalised for pulling back his opponent.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Everything is set for the start of the second half.

The players are likely to put the fans to sleep with this performance rather than receiving any vociferous support. Let's hope we are about to see an improvement in the second half. The hosts dominated much of the first period. The home team tries to prevail using combination football, while the away team adopt a defensive style of play.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle to end the first half and the players are now heading to their respective dressing rooms.
Chris Brunt (West Brom) hammered the ball from a long range free kick only into the defensive wall.

Chris Smalling (Manchester United) pulls the jersey of one of the opposition players and Michael Dean blows his whistle for a foul. West Brom win a free kick. It's a promising situation for a direct shot.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: There will be a minimum of 2 min. of added time.

Wayne Rooney (Manchester United) fails to deliver a decent cross from a long range free kick. The opposition's defence intercepts the effort.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Craig Dawson (West Brom) is shown a yellow card by the referee.

Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) collects a pass and has an effort from distance which is blocked. The ball is out of play. Manchester United win a corner kick.

Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) received a pass inside the box and sent a dangerous shot in on goal, but keep the champagne on ice as one of the defenders stepped in and blocked the effort. It's hard to say whether the keeper would have stopped it.
Anthony Martial (Manchester United) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
Mata (Manchester United) tries to slide the ball through to a teammate but it's well blocked by a defender.
Wayne Rooney (Manchester United) slides a pass forward, but one of the defenders cuts it out.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Chris Brunt (West Brom) floats the ball in from the corner but it's intercepted.
Darren Fletcher (West Brom) whips the ball into the box and Jose Rondon takes a perfect touch to control it, but one of the defenders does well to intercept. West Brom will take a corner kick.

Marcos Rojo (Manchester United) times his run too early and the linesman raises his flag for offside.

Bastian Schweinsteiger (Manchester United) strikes the rebound, but it goes well over the bar.

annotations.description: Wayne Rooney (Manchester United) swings in the corner kick, but one of the defenders leaps highest to head the ball away.

Jose Rondon (West Brom) comes close to scoring! He meets a lovely lofted pass from James McClean, but sends his close range header way wide of the left post.

Neat passing move from Manchester United in order to create new attacking opportunities.
